column2: BRIEF-Ellington Financial Says Estimated Book Value Per Common Share Was $19.90 At April 30 May 7 (Reuters) - Ellington Financial LLC: * ESTIMATED BOOK VALUE PER COMMON SHARE AS OF APRIL 30, 2018 WAS $19.90, OR $19.58 ON A DILUTED BASIS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Ellington Financial Reports Q1 EPS $0.67 May 7 (Reuters) - Ellington Financial LLC: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.36 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.67 INCLUDING ITEMS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
